name: Solar Castaway
description:
A scifi themed game still in early development.

Play as a journalist situated on a space station tethered to an asteroid. Your task to report on the scientific mission turns into a disaster when emergency protocol wakes you up from cryosleep.

Please fill the questionnaire once you have finished the first room and roamed the ship for awhile. https://forms.gle/c1aMYDqrG6ocd9na9

Made by Nachtu, VRock, SaunaChum and PinkViini. Thanks to Lepari and h3ssu for their help.
